inclusion.criterion: Mother willing to participate voluntarily and able to provide signed informed consent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Infant eligible for rotavirus vaccine immunization as per national policy (male or female infant, 6-12 weeks old)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Mother willing to undergo study procedures, including questionnaires, HIV counselling and testing, CD4 testing, and provide breast milk and blood sample at enrolment.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Mother willing for child to undergo study procedures including full-course rotavirus vaccination, phlebotomy at enrolment and 1 month post-rotavirus vaccination, and presentation to clinic for collection of stool sample when infant has diarrhoea.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Plans to remain resident in the area and willing to come for scheduled visits for the duration of the study.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Previous administration of rotavirus vaccine to child.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Recent immunosuppressive therapy in child (including high-dose systemic corticosteroids).
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of ever receiving a blood transfusion or blood products, including immunoglobulins within the last 6 months, for mother and child.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 3-day-old Asian female infant presenting with jaundice. She was born at 38w3d of gestation after an uncomplicated pregnancy.
